column4: Ok very newbie question when I'm looking at gnome-look.org it says GTK 2.x, Splash Screen, and GDM Theme can someone tell me the diffrence/what each of those changes plz
gtk themes are what the widgets look like, the splash screen shows between logging in and when trhe desktop is loaded, and the GDM theme is what the login screen looks like

So Splash is what normally shows all the things loading before it gets to the desktop,  GTK is that what is like a Windows Theme controls Window Color's/Fonts/Etc, while GDM theme is the login screen where I type user/pass?
